quality_assessment: Page is well-structured with minor CLI command discrepancies; excellent use of MkDocs Material features and cross-references are valid

issues.description: Documentation uses 'prodigy dlq show <job_id>' but CLI implementation uses 'prodigy dlq list --job-id <job_id>' for listing and 'prodigy dlq inspect <item_id>' for inspection
issues.fix_suggestion: Update all DLQ command references to use correct CLI syntax: 'prodigy dlq list --job-id <job_id>' for listing items
